trans-unit.source: Represents a proposed change to a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity" /> within a running workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: Representa uma alteração proposta um <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity" /> dentro de uma instância de fluxo de trabalho em execução.

trans-unit.source: This class is the base class for the canonical change actions which are added and removed and may be performed on a collection.
trans-unit.target: Essa classe é a classe base para as ações de alteração canônico que são adicionados e removidos e pode ser executada em uma coleção.

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a derived class, initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityChangeAction" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Quando implementado em uma classe derivada, inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityChangeAction" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityChangeAction" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityChangeAction" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityChangeAction" /> class, initializing the associated <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity" />.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityChangeAction" />, inicializando o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity" /> associado.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="compositeActivity" /> is a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="compositeActivity" /> é uma referência nula (<see langword="Nothing" /> no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: Gets and sets the <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityChangeAction.OwnerActivityDottedPath" /> of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity" /> associated with this instance.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityChangeAction.OwnerActivityDottedPath" /> do <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity" /> associado a esta instância.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityChangeAction.OwnerActivityDottedPath" /> of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity" /> associated with this instance.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityChangeAction.OwnerActivityDottedPath" /> do <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity" /> associado a esta instância.

trans-unit.source: This manipulates the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityChangeAction.OwnerActivityDottedPath%2A> member of the associated <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity>.
Therefore, trying to set this without first initializing the associated <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity> will cause an exception to be thrown.
trans-unit.target: Portanto, ao tentar definir isso sem primeiro inicializar associado <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity> fará com que uma exceção seja lançada.

trans-unit.source: The activity to have its changes validated.
trans-unit.target: A atividade que deve ter suas alterações validadas.

trans-unit.source: Validates the changes pending on the target activity.
trans-unit.target: Valida as alterações pendentes na atividade de destino.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ValidationErrorCollection" /> that contains any <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ValidationError" /> resulting from running each <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.Validator" /> defined for the target activity.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ValidationErrorCollection" /> que contém qualquer <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ValidationError" /> resultante da execução de cada <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.Validator" /> definido para a atividade de destino.

trans-unit.source: If `contextActivity` cannot be safely cast to a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity> a null reference is returned.
trans-unit.target: Se `contextActivity` não pode ser convertido com segurança para um <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity> uma referência nula é retornada.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="contextActivity" /> is a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="contextActivity" /> é uma referência nula (<see langword="Nothing" /> no Visual Basic).
